short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An advanced to-do list with doodle feature

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advanced To-Do List is a Chrome extension designed for seamless and efficient task management. With its intuitive interface, you can easily add, edit, and organize your daily tasks. Perfect for professionals, students, or anyone looking to streamline their day-to-day activities.
